headline: Bank of America’s First Investor Day Since 2011 Is Coming. Why the CEO Is on the Hot Seat.
summary: Bank of America’s stock has lagged behind rivals, notably industry leader JPMorgan Chase, over the past five years.

raw.headline: Bank of America’s First Investor Day Since 2011 Is Coming. Why the CEO Is on the Hot Seat.
raw.summary: Bank of America’s stock has lagged behind rivals, notably industry leader JPMorgan Chase, over the past five years.

headline: BAC's Investor Day Preview: Focus on Growth Strategy, Lagging Returns
summary: Bank of America's first Investor Day in over a decade aims to reignite growth, address lagging returns and sharpen its profitability roadmap.

raw.headline: BAC's Investor Day Preview: Focus on Growth Strategy, Lagging Returns
raw.summary: Bank of America's first Investor Day in over a decade aims to reignite growth, address lagging returns and sharpen its profitability roadmap.

headline: Bank of America readies biggest investor pitch since 2011 as stock trails rivals
summary: Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan and his top lieutenants aren't happy with how investors value the nation's second-largest bank compared to rivals. They're setting out to change that later this week.

raw.headline: Bank of America readies biggest investor pitch since 2011 as stock trails rivals
raw.summary: Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan and his top lieutenants aren't happy with how investors value the nation's second-largest bank compared to rivals. They're setting out to change that later this week.

headline: Citi hones tailored experience for services clients
summary: Delivering consumer-like capabilities for large companies requires “a mindset of design thinking first,” said Naveed Anwar, global head of platform and data services for Citi’s services unit.

raw.headline: Citi hones tailored experience for services clients
raw.summary: Delivering consumer-like capabilities for large companies requires “a mindset of design thinking first,” said Naveed Anwar, global head of platform and data services for Citi’s services unit.
